dr.app.beauti.generator
Class BaseComponentGenerator

java.lang.Object
  dr.app.beauti.generator.Generator
      dr.app.beauti.generator.BaseComponentGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
AncestralStatesComponentGenerator, ContinuousComponentGenerator, DiscreteTraitsComponentGenerator, DolloComponentGenerator, HierarchicalModelComponentGenerator, SequenceErrorModelComponentGenerator, TipDateSamplingComponentGenerator
public abstract class BaseComponentGenerator
extends Generator
implements ComponentGenerator

This is an abstract base class for component generators. Currently it simply wraps each insertion with a pair of comments.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Andrew Rambaut

Method Detail

generateAtInsertionPoint

public void generateAtInsertionPoint(Generator generator,
                                     ComponentGenerator.InsertionPoint point,
                                     java.lang.Object item,
                                     XMLWriter writer)
Description copied from interface: ComponentGenerator
Called to allow the component to generate at the particular insertion point. For some insertion points (currently only 'IN_TAXON') the specific item is given.

Specified by:
generateAtInsertionPoint in interface ComponentGenerator
Parameters:
generator - the calling generator
point - the insertion point
item - a reference to the item being generated (or null if not applicable)
writer - the XMLWriter
